p: Bowtie 2 ( Langmead et al., 2009) was used to map the high-quality paired-end reads from each sequence library to the transcriptome, and we recorded only the best alignment for each read. The ratio of reads mapped to the assembly is a useful criterion for evaluating the quality of the de novo assembled sequences. The number of reads mapped to each assembled contig was used for RNA-Seq expression analysis ( Mortazavi et al., 2008).
